title: DataProduct
description: A `Data Product` or `Data as a Product` is a logical unit that contains all components to process and store data for analytical or data-intensive use cases made available to data consumers.

id.description: Unique ID of the Data Product

name.description: A unique name of the Data Product

displayName.description: Name used for display purposes. Example 'Marketing', 'Payments', etc.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

experts.description: List of users who are experts for this Data Product.

domain.description: Domain or sub-domain to which this Data Product belongs to.

assets.description: Data assets collection that is part of this data product.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.
